DOC.brief_title: Color Stability E.Max CAD Laminate Veneers Cemented With Light Cure Versus Dual Cure Amine Free Adhesive Resin Cement
DOC.criteria: All subject require : From 1860 year old , able read sign inform consent document physically psychologically able tolerate conventional restorative procedure Have active periodontal pulpal disease , teeth good restoration Patients teeth problem indicate laminate veneer ( e.g . discoloration , fracture involve 50 % enamel loss , mild malposition , â€¦ . ) Willing return followup examination evaluation Patients growth stage partially erupt teeth Patient fracture teeth 50 % enamel loss Patients poor oral hygiene motivation Pregnant woman Psychiatric problem unrealistic expectation Lack opposite occlude dentition area intend restoration
